# Social Media Strategist: PetPulse

**Generated by:** StratArts Social Media Strategist
**Date:** December 2025
**Business:** PetPulse - Smart Pet Health Monitoring

---

## Executive Summary

PetPulse's social media strategy builds a community of engaged pet parents through educational content, emotional storytelling, and authentic user-generated content. Instagram serves as the primary brand-building platform, while Facebook drives community engagement and TikTok captures viral potential.

**Platform Priority:** Instagram > Facebook > TikTok > Twitter/X > YouTube
**Posting Frequency:** 1-2 posts/day across platforms
**Year 1 Target:** 75,000 combined followers, 3%+ engagement rate

---

## Platform Strategy Overview

### Platform Prioritization

| Platform | Priority | Audience Fit | Content Type | Goal |
|----------|----------|--------------|--------------|------|
| **Instagram** | P0 | Anxious Annie | Visual, Stories | Brand awareness, engagement |
| **Facebook** | P0 | All segments | Community, education | Community, conversions |
| **TikTok** | P1 | Younger, viral | Short-form video | Awareness, reach |
| **Twitter/X** | P2 | Tech-forward | News, engagement | Thought leadership |
| **YouTube** | P2 | All segments | Long-form video | Education, SEO |

## Instagram Strategy

### Profile Setup

**Username:** @petpulse
**Bio:**
```
ğŸ¾ Know your pet is healthy, always
ğŸ“± 24/7 vital monitoring + instant vet access
ğŸ©º Peace of mind for pet parents
ğŸ“ #PetPulse | Link below â¬‡ï¸
```

**Highlights:**
- How It Works
- Success Stories
- Pet Tips
- FAQs
- Reviews

### Content Pillars (Instagram)

| Pillar | % of Content | Format | Example |
|--------|--------------|--------|---------|
| Pet Health Tips | 30% | Carousels, Reels | "5 signs of dehydration" |
| Product Features | 20% | Reels, Stories | Dashboard walkthrough |
| Customer Stories | 25% | Feed posts, Reels | Early detection story |
| UGC/Community | 15% | Reposts, Features | Customer pet photos |
| Brand/Culture | 10% | Behind-scenes, Team | Office dogs, team |

### Content Calendar (Weekly)

| Day | Feed | Stories | Reels |
|-----|------|---------|-------|
| Mon | Health tip carousel | Poll: Pet concern | - |
| Tue | - | Q&A sticker | Quick tip (30s) |
| Wed | Product feature | Testimonial share | - |
| Thu | Customer story | Interactive quiz | Demo Reel |
| Fri | - | UGC roundup | Trending format |
| Sat | UGC feature | Weekend vibes | - |
| Sun | Inspirational quote | Pet of the week | - |

### Instagram Stories Strategy

**Daily Stories:**
- Morning: Good morning + pet tip
- Afternoon: Interactive (poll, quiz, question)
- Evening: UGC or testimonial

**Story Types:**
- Educational (quick tips)
- Interactive (polls, quizzes, questions)
- Behind-the-scenes
- User-generated content
- Product features
- Testimonials

### Instagram Reels Strategy

**Posting:** 3-5 Reels per week
**Length:** 15-60 seconds
**Types:**
- Educational (health tips)
- Product demos
- Trending audio adaptations
- Customer transformations
- Day-in-the-life

**Trending Format Examples:**
- "POV: Your dog when..." + health message
- Before/after format (worry â†’ peace of mind)
- "Things pet parents worry about at 3am"
- Health myth busting

---

## Facebook Strategy

### Page Setup

**Page Name:** PetPulse
**Category:** Pet Service, Technology Company
**About:** "24/7 pet health monitoring and instant vet access. Peace of mind for pet parents."

### Content Strategy (Facebook)

| Content Type | Frequency | Goal |
|--------------|-----------|------|
| Educational posts | 3x/week | Engagement, authority |
| Customer stories | 2x/week | Social proof |
| Product updates | 1x/week | Awareness |
| Live Q&As | 2x/month | Community, trust |
| Blog shares | 2x/week | Traffic, SEO |

### Facebook Group Strategy

**Group Name:** "PetPulse Pet Parents Community"
**Launch:** Month 3 (after initial customer base)

**Group Rules:**
1. Be kind and supportive
2. No spam or self-promotion
3. Pet health questions welcome
4. Share your PetPulse stories
5. Respect privacy

**Group Content:**
- Weekly "Ask a Vet" threads
- Success story celebrations
- New feature discussions
- Pet photo Fridays
- Health tip Mondays

**Moderation:**
- Community guidelines pinned
- Admin response within 24 hours
- Weekly featured posts
- Monthly member spotlights

---

## TikTok Strategy

### Profile Setup

**Username:** @petpulse
**Bio:**
```
ğŸ¾ Pet health monitoring that actually works
ğŸ“± See your pet's vitals 24/7
ğŸ©º Vet access in minutes
Link in bio ğŸ‘‡
```

### Content Pillars (TikTok)

| Pillar | % | Examples |
|--------|---|----------|
| Educational | 35% | Health tips, myth busting |
| Trending | 25% | Adapted trends with brand message |
| Product | 20% | App features, unboxing |
| UGC/Stories | 15% | Customer content, testimonials |
| Behind-scenes | 5% | Team, office dogs |

### TikTok Content Ideas

**Trending Adaptations:**
- Use trending sounds with pet health twist
- "Pet parent struggles" relatable content
- "Nobody: ... Pet parents at 3am:" format
- Reaction videos to pet health myths

**Educational:**
- "3 things your dog's behavior tells you"
- "How to check your dog's heart rate"
- "Signs you should call the vet"
- "What's actually normal for dogs"

**Product:**
- Unboxing and setup
- "What I see on my PetPulse app"
- Before/after anxiety comparison
- Vet consultation demo

### Posting Strategy

- Frequency: 1-2 videos/day
- Best times: 7am, 12pm, 7pm
- Length: 15-45 seconds optimal
- Hook in first 3 seconds critical

## Twitter/X Strategy

### Profile Setup

**Handle:** @PetPulseHealth
**Bio:** "24/7 pet vital monitoring + instant vet access. Building the future of pet health. #PetTech #PetHealth"

### Content Strategy

| Content Type | Frequency | Example |
|--------------|-----------|---------|
| Product updates | 2x/week | Feature launches |
| Industry news | 3x/week | Commentary, reshares |
| Tips/education | 2x/week | Quick health tips |
| Engagement | Daily | Replies, community |
| Threads | 1x/week | Deep dives |

### Thread Topics

- "How we built PetPulse"
- "The pet healthcare crisis explained"
- "What your pet's vitals actually mean"
- "Behind the scenes of pet AI"
- "Customer stories that motivate us"

---

## Content Creation Guidelines

### Visual Style Guide

**Photography:**
- Natural lighting preferred
- Authentic pet moments (not staged)
- Pet-owner connection shots
- App/product in natural setting
- Diverse breeds and pet types

**Graphics:**
- Brand colors (Pulse Blue, Health Coral)
- Clean, minimal design
- Consistent templates
- Readable text overlays
- Professional but warm

### Caption Guidelines

**Instagram:**
- Hook in first line
- 2-3 short paragraphs max
- Clear CTA
- 3-5 relevant hashtags
- Emoji usage: moderate

**Facebook:**
- Longer form acceptable
- Question to drive engagement
- Link in post when relevant
- Minimal hashtags (0-2)

**TikTok:**
- Short, punchy
- Include trending hashtags
- Call to action
- Searchable keywords

### Hashtag Strategy

**Branded:**
- #PetPulse
- #PetPulsePack
- #PeaceOfMindPetParent

**Industry:**
- #PetHealth
- #DogHealth
- #PetParent
- #DogMom
- #DogDad

**Trending:**
- Monitor weekly trending tags
- Adapt to pet/brand context
- Don't force irrelevant trends

---

## Community Management

### Response Guidelines

| Comment Type | Response Time | Tone |
|--------------|---------------|------|
| Product question | <2 hours | Helpful, informative |
| Complaint | <1 hour | Empathetic, solution-focused |
| Praise | <4 hours | Grateful, warm |
| Health concern | <1 hour | Supportive, direct to resources |
| Troll/spam | <1 hour | Hide/delete, don't engage |

### Response Templates

**Product Question:**
"Great question! [Answer]. Feel free to DM us if you have more questionsâ€”we're here to help! ğŸ¾"

**Complaint:**
"We're sorry to hear this, [Name]. This isn't the experience we want for you. Please DM us so we can make this right. ğŸ’™"

**Success Story:**
"This is exactly why we built PetPulse! ğŸ‰ So happy [pet name] is doing well. Thank you for sharing! â¤ï¸"

**Health Concern:**
"We understand how worrying this can be. While we can't provide medical advice here, we'd recommend consulting with a vet. If you're a PetPulse user, you can connect with one instantly in the app. ğŸ©º"

### Engagement Strategy

**Proactive Engagement:**
- Like and comment on tagged posts
- Engage with pet parent communities
- Respond to industry conversations
- Share and celebrate customer content

**UGC Curation:**
- Monitor branded hashtags
- Request permission before resharing
- Credit original creator
- Feature diverse pets and owners

---

## Paid Social Strategy

### Platform Budget Split

| Platform | % of Budget | Focus |
|----------|-------------|-------|
| Instagram | 35% | Awareness, engagement |
| Facebook | 45% | Conversion, retargeting |
| TikTok | 15% | Awareness, reach |
| Twitter | 5% | Thought leadership |

### Campaign Types

**Awareness:**
- Video views optimization
- Reach campaigns
- Brand content boosting
- Influencer content amplification

**Consideration:**
- Traffic to website
- Engagement campaigns
- Lead generation (email)
- Video views (educational)

**Conversion:**
- Purchase optimization
- Dynamic product ads
- Retargeting campaigns
- Cart abandonment

### Audience Targeting

**Cold Audiences:**
- Pet owners (interest)
- Dog breed specific
- Pet health interest
- Similar to competitor followers
- Pet parent demographics

**Warm Audiences:**
- Website visitors
- Video viewers (50%+)
- Email subscribers
- Social engagers

**Hot Audiences:**
- Add to cart
- Checkout abandoned
- Past purchasers (upsell)
- High-value lookalikes

---

## Influencer Strategy

### Influencer Tiers

| Tier | Followers | Payment | Deliverables |
|------|-----------|---------|--------------|
| Nano | 1K-10K | Product only | 2 posts |
| Micro | 10K-50K | Product + $200-500 | 3 posts + Stories |
| Mid | 50K-200K | $1,000-3,000 | Campaign package |
| Macro | 200K-1M | $3,000-10,000 | Multi-platform |
| Mega | 1M+ | Negotiated | Partnership |

### Ideal Influencer Profile

**Must-Haves:**
- Authentic pet content
- Engaged community (3%+ engagement)
- Aligned values (pet health focus)
- Quality content production
- Authentic voice

**Nice-to-Haves:**
- Has discussed pet health
- Located in target markets
- Multiple platforms
- Long-term partnership interest

### Influencer Campaign Types

**Product Seeding:**
- Send product to 50+ nano/micro influencers
- No posting requirement
- Authentic reviews expected
- Low cost, organic feel

**Sponsored Content:**
- Contracted posts with disclosure
- Specific messaging guidelines
- Trackable codes/links
- Clear deliverables

**Brand Ambassador:**
- Long-term relationship (6-12 months)
- Ongoing content
- Exclusive partnership
- Higher investment, higher loyalty

---

## Social Media Metrics

### KPIs by Platform

**Instagram:**
| Metric | Target (M6) | Target (M12) |
|--------|-------------|--------------|
| Followers | 20,000 | 50,000 |
| Engagement rate | 4% | 3.5% |
| Story views | 3,000/story | 8,000/story |
| Link clicks | 500/week | 2,000/week |

**Facebook:**
| Metric | Target (M6) | Target (M12) |
|--------|-------------|--------------|
| Page followers | 10,000 | 25,000 |
| Post reach | 15,000/post | 40,000/post |
| Engagement rate | 2% | 2% |
| Group members | 1,000 | 5,000 |

**TikTok:**
| Metric | Target (M6) | Target (M12) |
|--------|-------------|--------------|
| Followers | 15,000 | 40,000 |
| Avg views | 10,000 | 50,000 |
| Engagement rate | 6% | 5% |
| Viral videos (100K+) | 2 | 10 |

### Reporting Cadence

**Weekly:**
- Post performance
- Engagement metrics
- Follower growth
- Top performing content

**Monthly:**
- Full analytics review
- Content audit
- Influencer performance
- Paid social ROI
- Competitor analysis

---

## Tools & Resources

### Social Media Tools

| Function | Tool | Cost |
|----------|------|------|
| Scheduling | Buffer or Later | $50-100/mo |
| Analytics | Sprout Social or native | $100-300/mo |
| Listening | Mention or Brandwatch | $100+/mo |
| Design | Canva Pro | $15/mo |
| Video editing | CapCut | Free |
| Link in bio | Linktree | Free-$5/mo |

### Content Resources

- Stock photos: Unsplash, Pexels (free)
- Video clips: Pexels Videos (free)
- Graphics templates: Canva
- Trending audio: TikTok, Instagram

---

## Summary

### Platform Priorities

| Platform | Role | Investment |
|----------|------|------------|
| Instagram | Primary brand building | High |
| Facebook | Community + conversion | High |
| TikTok | Viral reach | Medium |
| Twitter/X | Thought leadership | Low |
| YouTube | Long-form education | Low (initially) |

### Year 1 Goals

| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Total followers | 75,000 |
| Avg engagement rate | 3%+ |
| Social referral traffic | 15,000/month |
| Influencer partnerships | 50+ |
| UGC posts featured | 200+ |

### Key Success Factors

1. **Consistency** - Post every day, no exceptions
2. **Authenticity** - Real pets, real stories
3. **Community** - Two-way conversation, not broadcast
4. **Trends** - Adapt quickly, stay relevant
5. **Quality** - Better to post less than post poorly
